snippet: Home runs have been a hallmark of plenty of current contenders and past champions.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column dismisses the notion that home-run teams shrivel in October; notes that the New York Yankees won the World Series in 2009 by setting a franchise record for home runs, with 244, and leading the majors in that category.
lead_paragraph: Home runs have been a hallmark of plenty of current contenders and past champions.

headline.seo: Despite Criticism of Yankees, Relying on Power Is Not a Weakness
headline.main: History Shows Relying on Power Is Not a Weakness
headline.print_headline: History Shows Relying on Power Is Not a Weakness
